pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Simple Sequencer for Data Sonification // A rudimentary sequencer to define, manipulate and mix sound samples. The underlying motivation is to sonify data, as demonstrated in the blog https://globxblog.github.io/, the presentation by Renard and Le Bescond (2022, https://hal.science/hal-03710340v1) or the poster by Renard et al. (2023, https://hal.inrae.fr/hal-04388845v1).
